description:
This course teaches you the principles you need to thrive in your personal and professional life. This course will help you:

  • Make more money
  • Conquer your weight and fitness goals (yes, you can shed that extra 10 lbs and fit into your high school clothes with my tips!)
  • Create and nurture AWESOME relationships
  • Be happy more often

Starting and maintaining a business can be stressful. Entrepreneurs who don't practice happiness principles are more likely to give up and fail. This can have a dramatic impact on your finances, health and relationships.

By the end of this course, you will:

  • Understand the foundation of positive psychology
  • Have a roadmap to increase your earnings
  • Create a personalized exercise and nutrition plan that's tailored just for you
  • Have kick ass relationships

You will have valuable skills to help you cope with life challenges. You will also create a motivation portfolio that will act as a road map to take you from where you are to where you want to be. You'll also receive a bonus copy of Max's Amazon best selling ebook, "Wealth, Health & Happiness: 7 Secrets for Successful Millennials."

These lessons will make you more motivated and inspired to accomplish your deepest desires and follow your life's purpose.

Contents and Overview

This course contains 27 lectures and over 2 hours of content. It's designed for entrepreneurs, business owners, and freelancers regardless of age, industry and mastery of personal development.
title: The Entrepreneur's Complete Guide To Getting Noticed
